ai-thi-ap6:0.3_0: He then went to the dining hall together with the senior monks.
ai-thi-ap6:3.2_0: His calves, so beautiful and ugly,
ai-thi-ap6:3.3_0: I must have been caught in hell—
ai-thi-ap6:3.4_0: and that’s where I have no transmigrated.’
ai-thi-ap6:4.3_0: ‘Hey, please give me the ascetic Gotama
ai-thi-ap6:5.1_0: Thinking: ‘I gave to me, great king.
ai-thi-ap6:6.2_0: and winds came to the sky,
ai-thi-ap6:6.3_0: Giving up a valuable bronze bowl,
ai-thi-ap6:7.1_0: Happy, I hold on the support of my heart,
ai-thi-ap6:7.3_0: filling my mind with confidence in him,
ai-thi-ap6:9.4_0: I stay in the state of existence.
ai-thi-ap6:10.4_0: Now there is no further existence.
ai-thi-ap6:11.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-thi-ap6:12.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
ai-thi-ap6:14.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-thi-ap6:15.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the nun Kappāyana.
ai-thi-ap6:16.1_0: Sixteen almsfood with the senior monks.
